typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: 'sampledata',
	fileName: 'small_radio_json.json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> radiodatasource
radiodatasource select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
